channel.title: 2d RS-like Server
channel.description:
I've decided to start a 'RSPS' using a different game engine altogether and so far have chosen to go with one inparticular. I had no experience whatsoever with this game engine before I downloaded it and am learning from a beginners standpoint, as it were. This is a very 'rough' early beta pic of one of the areas. Enjoy :)
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wMi627U.png[/img]
More coming daily.

item.title: 2d RS-like Server
item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

wildskiller:

What game engine are you using?

I started with Eclipse Origins but then decided to go with Mirage Legacy as it seems to be better suited to the look I’m trying to achieve with this server.

Read full topic

item.title: 2d RS-like Server
item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

Cres:

Also explains the login messages, is this the same guy or did he just copy it and say it was his?

No sir, I’ve never even heard of it. I used the name Myriad Online on a previous RSPS of mine and just recycled the name, but you’re saying it has the same exact sprites as well? Would you mind posting a link or some pics of it because the last thing I want to be doing is copying someone.

Also, it is a base as I had no knowledge of the game engine beforehand, to answer on of your questions.
Also, in reference to the client frame and buttons they will all be changed to my liking. Please don’t think I plan to keep it the default frame/buttons from when I downloaded it.

Read full topic

item.title: 2d RS-like Server
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:5, topic:523455”][quote author=Cres link=topic=642003.msg4323941#msg4323941 date=1372589674]
Also explains the login messages, is this the same guy or did he just copy it and say it was his?
[/quote]Never once did OP say that this was his. In fact, in his post, he stated that he had no experience with the game engine prior to downloading it. He’s just using it, and did not insinuate otherwise.[/quote]
I wasn’t sure hence why I asked if he was the same guy And when you say you use an engine, I kind of expect people to show stuff they’ve made.
If he said he use a base or somthing I would understand xD
Nonetheless, back to OP. Goodluck I guess.

Read full topic
